useSameEmail: Use same Email as Login Email
isACompanyDonation: This donation is made by a company
askPublishName: Show my full name in the Plant-for-the-Planet app & leaderboards.
nameAlreadyPublished: Your full name will appear in leaderboard as your Plant-for-the-Planet profile is currently public.
orgNamePublishedTax: Company name is visible on our leaderboard and app. Tax-deduction receipts will be issued for the same name.
orgNamePublished: Company name is visible on our leaderboard and app.
youWillReceiveTaxDeduction: You will receive a tax deduction receipt for
taxDeductionNotYetAvailable: Tax deduction is not yet available for
taxDeductionNotAvailableForProject: Tax deduction is not yet available for this project
noPaymentMethodError: Could not process your payment, please try again.
sofortDisclaimer: SOFORT payments take 2-14 business days (usually 2-3 days). As soon as it arrives we will send you a confirmation email with your tree certificate and raise the tree counter.
sepaDisclaimer: SEPA payments take 2-14 business days (usually 3-5 days). As soon as it arrives we will send you a confirmation email with your tree certificate and raise the tree counter.
sepaMessage: By providing your IBAN and confirming this payment, you authorize Plant-for-the-Planet and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account. You are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. If you have any issues regarding your donation, please send us an email to support@plant-for-the-planet.org
bankTransferDisclaimer:
Bank transfers usually take 1–5 business days to reach us.
As soon as your transfer arrives we will send you a confirmation email with your receipts (and your certificate).
transferDetailsMessage: Thank You! To complete your donation, please transfer it with the reference specified below. This information was also emailed to you.
pleaseDoNotCloseThisTab: Please do not close this tab!
donationSuccessfulWith: Your {{frequency}} donation of {{currency}} {{totalAmount}} was successfully paid with {{paymentTypeUsed}}.
giftSentMessage: We've sent an email to {{recipientName}} about the gift.
contributionMessage: Maybe you'll visit them some day? In the mean time, maybe hook up your friends with some trees of their own by telling them about yours?
fundingDonationSuccess: Thank you for your contribution! You’ll receive a confirmation for your contribution on your email.
fundingContributionMessage: We will keep you posted about our actions, in the mean time maybe share with your friends about your contribution.
yourTreesPlantedByOnLocation: Your {{treeCount}} trees will be planted by {{projectName}} in {{location}}.
m2conservedByOnLocation: {{quantity}} m² forest will be conserved by {{projectName}} in {{location}}.
myTreesPlantedByOnLocation: My {{treeCount}} trees are being planted in {{location}}.
iDonatedForestOnLocation: I donated {{amount}} for forest conservation in {{location}}.
weDonatedForestOnLocation: We donated {{amount}} for forest conservation in {{location}}.
thankyouHeaderText:
We're on the road to a

Trillion Trees

.
donationFailedMessage: Something went wrong while completing your payment. If you continue having issues please reach out to us at support@plant-for-the-planet.org
donationPendingMessage: We are currently waiting for the confirmation from your bank. This might take some time so, please feel free to close this page. We’ll send your receipt via email shortly.
privacyPolicyNotice: By using this website, you agree to our
verifyEmailText: To secure your account, we need to verify your email. Please check your inbox or spam/junk folder for a confirmation email and then continue to login.
verifyEmailInfo: If you didn’t receive an email please try logging in again and we’ll send you another email.
donationProcessedBy: This donation is handled by Plant-for-the-Planet.
giftSomeone: My donation is dedicated to someone
errorOccurred: Something went wrong. Please feel free to take a screenshot and email us at support@plant-for-the-planet.org.
janeSuccessMessage: In the mean time please share the word on social Media with #TreesForJane, and tune to a message from Jane below.
backToTreesForJane: Go back to Trees for Jane
fallbackdescription: Make tax deductible donations to over 200+ restoration and conservation projects. Your journey to a trillion trees starts here.
